patthana21.35:4.1: Nahetu naajjhatto dhammo hetussa ajjhattassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana21.35:4.3: Ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā upanissaye nava, purejāte atthiyā avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.35:5.1: Nahetu nabahiddhā dhammo hetussa bahiddhā dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana21.35:5.3: Ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā upanissaye nava, purejāte atthiyā avigate tīṇi.
